title: loot el question
body: I apparently regained my loot after being a "reformed summoner"  Are you suppose to start at level 0 or how does it work? I dont care about the loot shit ngl but id still like to know how it works

replies.body: After getting a penalty like a chat restriction, you can drop down to Honor rank 0 if you're already at rank 1. At this point, you won't get any hextech keys until you've ranked up to at least Honor 1. You can still get hextech chests and mastery tokens while Honor 0, but only after reforming and unlocking your loot like you did.
